page.title: 13Joseph' day-------St.Helens
page.content: I get up at a Quarter to eight.Then I get dressed and go downstairs.Next,I have my breakfast.After that I switch on the t.v. and Watch Breakfast Time. Sometimes I play an electronic game. Usually when I get to school I am late! First we say prayers;next,we do Maths or English.At break-time I play Friends and Enemies, where you must throw a ball for the others to catch. If they do catch it you go to their side and play for them.Sometimes I play Rounders where there are four stumps,some batters and some fielders. You must hit the ball and run round the stumps. After break-time we do Maths,unless we have done it earlier.If we have done it we do Ginn 360.Sometimes in the afternoon we do Art. When I get home I play games.
